name: 陳怡倩
objective: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
schedule:
Week	Topic
1	Course Introduction
2	Paragraph Writing: Comparing or Contrasting I
3	Paragraph Writing: Comparing or Contrasting II
4	Peer Review: Comparing or Contrasting
5	Sentence Variety I
6	Sentence Variety II
7	Paragraph Writing: Explaining I
8	Paragraph Writing: Explaining II
9	Peer Review: Explaining
10	Creative Writing I
11	Creative Writing II
12	Peer Review: Creative Writing
13	Readability: Sentence Flow I
14	Readability: Sentence Flow II
15	Essay Writing: Cause and Effect I
16	Essay Writing: Cause and Effect II
17	Peer Review: Cause and Effect
18	Final Exam
scorePolicy: Attendance & Participation (15%); Class Activities (15%); Pop Quizzes (20%); Assignments (40%), Final (10%)
materials:
Required Textbooks: 
Donald, Robert B., Morrow, Betty R., Wargetz, Lillian G., & Werner, Kathleen. (1995). Writing Clear Essays (3rd). Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall.
Donald, Robert B., Moore, James D., Morrow, Betty R., Wargetz, Lillian G., & Werner, Kathleen. (1998). Writing Clear Paragraphs (6th). Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall.

References:
Azar, Betty S. (1998.) Understanding and Using English Grammar (3rd). White Plains, NY: Pearson Education.
Butler, Eugenia, Hickman, Mary A., McAlexander, Patricia J., & Overby, Lalla. (1995). Correct Writing (6th). Lexington, MA: D. C. Health and Company.
Frank, Marcella. (2003). Modern English Part II: Sentences & Complex Structures (2nd). Taipei, Taiwan: Pearson Education Taiwan.
Frank, Marcella. (1986). Modern English Part I: Exercise for Non-native Speakers. Englewood Cliffs, NJ: Prentice Hall Regents.
